name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an accomplished Senior Google Engineer, I possess extensive experience in **Google Cloud** and adept at **IT Consulting** and **Project Management** for high-performance solutions. My background includes **Cloud Services** expertise, enabling effective integration and collaboration with tools like **Google Workspace** and **Microsoft Active Directory**. I excel in **Networking** and demonstrate strong **Customer Service** capabilities while promoting **Team Collaboration** through continuous learning initiatives. 

With 8 years as a Full Stack Developer, I have effectively harnessed modern technologies including JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter** to deliver enterprise-grade platforms. My proficiency in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, combined with deep knowledge of **Azure** and **AWS**, empower me to build robust applications compliant with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I also have hands-on experience in creating machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, ensuring real-time data processing and intelligent automation.
